- Welcome spring by fighting Savage Rabbits and rallying Rabbit Huts
- Compete in our special Spring Event for the chance to win an exclusive Easter Gear Set for your Commander
- Complete daily tasks to earn rewards including resources, speedups, VIP Points, Commander XP, Commander Stamina and Gold
- Several usability improvements and various bug fixes
- Improved new player tutorial

Eu la release notes am pus asa:
- Contribute with your fellow Alliance mates to Alliance Researches that improve your base bonuses, reduces timers and even increases march speed!
- Top 100 players now visible (nearly) in realtime in Commander Events
- Game engine improvements
- Bug fixes

Various bug fixes and improvements
Various bug fixes and improvements
- Several bug fixes
- Several bug fixes
- Several bug fixes

- You can now use PRESETS for your all your Commanders
- Receive Daily and Weekly REWARDS from donating to Alliance Research
- Recommend an Alliance Research if you are rank 4 or 5
- Check the report you get when an Alliance Research is completed
- Various UI/UX improvements related to the Commanders Menu & Alliance Research Menu
- Several bug fixes among which:
-> discrepancies between training and research timers
-> mismatched art for commander Stonewall and Longstreet
-> rate my app screen appearing too often
-> active marches screen displayed in the Chat

Added support for an exciting new Thanksgiving Event - Feed the Turkey:
- Get Chestnuts Boxes from different actions and feed them to a Hungry Turkey
- You can claim amazing rewards with each Turkey level-up
- A new Leadership Commander is also available for unlocking
Fixed several issues such as:
- Inability to teleport at the start of State Kill Event
- White House in contested mode at the start of the State Kill event
- Tutorial fixes

- You can claim amazing rewards with each Turkey level-up
- A new Leadership Commander is also available for unlocking

- Inability to teleport at the start of State Kill Event
- White House in contested mode at the start of the State Kill event
- Tutorial fixes

NEW Event Type: “Springfield Armory”
Trade Silver Dollars and Copper Cents for excellent rewards including new chests that contain Commander Talents and one of a kind Equipment and Supplies

Improved the Items tab for a better user experience
Town view improvements
Fixed several issues such as:
- Missing ongoing marches when joining a Rally
- Stuck active march when recalling troops from White House that occupied it
- Several supplies bonuses

- Several improvements and fixes for the Battle of the Union Event:
Fixed the points awarding system and other general issues
Introduced a new limited edition Fort Skin as reward
- Revamped the State Map graphics
- Removed Winter theme
- Several bug fixes:
Fixed remaining active march after White House attack
Fixed the expired Shield Reports timer format
Changed contrast of map tiles
Fix infinite zoom issue
Zooming on map no longer triggers tile popups
New training window now opened also trough the progress bar

Get in on the permanent Fort Expansion Event - rewards are given retroactively
Take joy in the better-looking menu for researching and upgrading buildings
Use Siege troops to gather resources: they now have greatly increased load capacity!
Updated the Alliance feature with the following improvements:
- Alliances have now their own profiles - make sure to check them out
- Alliance dot notification for available rallies
- Excited for 4 letters acronym? w00t!
- Alliance listing available anytime

Added support for a new exciting Event - Battle of Gettysburg
- Get Scout Letters by completing certain actions. Use them to reveal the Gettysburg’s tactical map
Claim amazing rewards and challenge yourself to recruit the NEW Commander voted by our community
Fixed several issues such as:
- Equipment menu overlapped by arrow in the Commanders menu on tablets
- Multiple active marches after occupying and recalling troops from White House
- Daily Task completed for Researches using speed ups

- NEW Prison Camp building:
Part of your killed troops will end up in the Prison Camp, within Prisoner Capacity
Level up the Prison Camp to increase its capacity and reduce the release time
- Graphic and usability improvements for the Header from the main menu
- Balance changes for points received for training, injuring and killing Tier 5 Troops in Train and Kill Events
- Several Bug fixes
